title: Because I had too Much Strength, I became an Adventurer’s Bag Carrier - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adventurers   Broken Engagement   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: Sanko Moko   三同もこ
description:
I was your ordinary country girl, if not for my extraordinary strength. Not only was it a hindrance, it was also part of the reason of my failed engagement! Thus, I decided to find my own place in the world…

I didn’t need a man anymore, nor did I need to get married.
The moment they learned about my superhuman strength, they were all going to call me a monster, anyway.
No matter how hard I tried, it wasn’t like my strength would just vanish one day. Besides, how long would I be able to hide it for? 
I wanted to live with this power without needing to hide it.


Thus I, Narisa, who have too much strength, decided to join a party of adventurers and carry their bags for them.>
